about.title: About me
paragraphs:
“He who stops being better stops being good.”
This thought has accompanied me for many years and reflects my professional path.
With experience in software development and quality assurance, I have learned to analyze technical systems in depth, work in a structured manner, and understand quality as a central responsibility.
Continuous improvement is a natural part of my work. That is why I am now moving further toward test automation—as a logical extension of my previous roles.
Open to new technologies, methods, and industries, I aim to contribute to creating reliable and transparent software solutions in the future.
